TopicTitle: SAS "up" direction not available when speed below 1m/s

Articles.Content:
KSP2 0.1.0.0.20892   -   Windows 10 Home 21H2   -   Ryzen 9 3950X   -   RTX 2080 Ti (Driver 528.49)

Observed: The SAS "up" direction is not available below 1m/s. If it is already active, it is deselected once the speed falls below 1m/s.

Expected: As the up vector is not dependent on the current movement, it should always be available. It is useful to balance tall landers (in landed state) and hovercraft (during hovering, speed 0 m/s).
